about_the_game:
Tanne: Portals of Eternity is a frantic action game where you take control of Tanne, the guardian of interdimensional portals. When the ancient artifact that holds the key to these portals becomes corrupted, monstrous hordes begin invading the present world, threatening to destroy the balance between dimensions. In an endless fight for survival, you'll face infinite waves of enemies pouring through unstable portals.

Unlock powerful spells, collect magical artifacts, and strategize your way to overcome these relentless assaults. Time is short, the danger is immense, and only those who adapt to the challenges may survive. Prepare for nonstop action in a battle against the forces of corruption that will test your reflexes and endurance!

In an endless fight for survival, you'll face infinite waves of enemies pouring through unstable portals.

Unlock powerful spells, collect magical artifacts, and strategize your way to overcome these relentless assaults. Time is short, the danger is immense, and only those who adapt to the challenges may survive. Prepare for nonstop action in a battle against the forces of corruption that will test your reflexes and endurance!

name: Tanne: Portals of Eternity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tanne: Portals of Eternity is an intense action survival game. Face endless waves of monsters while unlocking powerful spells and collecting magical artifacts. Fight to survive the relentless onslaught of hordes, testing your skills and reflexes in an endless battle.
